The provided Node.js code is a module that imports a default export from a file named `index.js` located in the same directory and then re-exports that default export.

Here is the rewritten version of the Node.js code:

```javascript
"use strict";

// Import the default export from the 'index.js' module in the same directory
const { default: defaultExport } = require("./index");

// Export the imported default export
module.exports = defaultExport;
```
